displayNameHelper: [hi] Only needed if you're creating a new account.
displayNameRequiredToast: [hi] Display name must be at least 2 characters.
accountCreatedToastDescription: [hi] Please check your email to confirm your account if email confirmation is enabled.
noWeatherData: [hi] No weather data available. Try getting current location or enter coordinates.
geolocationNotSupportedToastDescription: [hi] Browser doesn't support geolocation. Enter location manually.
fetchingWeatherForCurrentLocationToast: [hi] Fetching weather for your current location.
geolocationErrorToastDescription: [hi] Could not get current location: {{message}}. Using default.
invalidLatLonToastDescription: [hi] Please enter valid numbers for latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180).
pestAlertsWidgetDescription: [hi] AI-generated pest insights for the selected region.
getPestAlertsForLocationButton: [hi] Get Pest Alerts for Entered Location
noSpecificPestAlertsDescription: [hi] No high-priority pest alerts identified for your current location.
noPestAlertData: [hi] No pest alert data available. Try fetching for your location.
marketTrendsWidgetDescription: [hi] AI-generated market insights and top crop recommendation for the selected region.
getMarketTrendsForLocationButton: [hi] Get Market Trends for Entered Location
noSpecificCropTrendsAvailableDescription: [hi] The AI could not identify specific crop trends for this location.
noMarketTrendData: [hi] No market trend data available. Try fetching for your location.
marketTrendsFooterDisclaimer: [hi] Market insights, recommendations and charts are AI-generated and for informational purposes only. Not financial advice.
aiCropAdvisorCardDescription: [hi] Get personalized crop suggestions. Fields like Region, Weather, and Market Data may be auto-filled from other dashboard widgets.
regionCoordinatesPlaceholder: [hi] e.g., Central Valley or Lat: 34.05, Lon: -118.24
cropHistoryPlaceholder: [hi] Describe past crops, yields, and any issues (e.g., Corn (2 years ago) - good yield, Soybeans (last year) - pest problems)
currentWeatherSummaryPlaceholder: [hi] Summarize recent/expected weather (e.g., Mild spring, average rainfall, upcoming heatwave)
currentMarketDataSummaryPlaceholder: [hi] Summarize relevant market trends (e.g., High demand for organic produce, corn prices stable)
